language.entry: Privateer

The Privateer's travels over the seas has left her with knowledge and preparation against the evils of land. The Privateer equiped with rifle and sword; is ready for the front line, a bottle rum helps when things get out of control.

Hated and marked by pirates and sea fiends alike, The Privateer travels the sea with her bounties and orders to kill and bring proof of the job completed, marking enemies and blasting them with her guns she is ready to enter the depths of the hamlet.
Being a seasoned hunter of treasure and pirates, the sea-life has left with some skills to playing a instruments to enterain and bring citrus fruit to help against diease..
Strike Them Down!
Hunt Them Down
Bottle of Rum
Dead Ahead
The Duckfoot
Flames of the Sea
Barrel O' Gunpowder
Move
Strike Them Down!
Hunt Them Down
Bottle of Rum
Dead Ahead
The Duckfoot
Flames of the Sea
Barrel O' Gunpowder
Cutlass & Rifle
Refined Cutless & Cleaned Rifle
Readied Cutless & Modifed Rifle
Officer's Sword & Naval Rifle
"Pirate Slayer & Galleon Sinker"
Sword & Gun
Dirty Jacket & Cap
Peasent's Jacket & Hat
Bucceneer's Outfit & Hat
Officer's Outfit & Hat
"Privateer's Getup"
Robe & Accessories
Come Judgement Day, I'll see YOU burn, demon, so I'll have the last laugh! BRING IT!
WOUND CARE
ENCOURAGE
PEP TALK
privateerAL VIGIL
JUDICIAL CONFISCATION
MY FAITH IS MY SHIELD
WHOLESOME INSTRUCTION
A time to kill and a time to heal.
A time to love and a time to hate.
A time to tear and a time to sew.
Look. Under the cowl. I'm still me. It'll be fine, alright?
Remember that evil cannot win. Victory was predetermined from the start.
Do not be afraid. Keep on believing.
You made it this far. That alone puts you above many in the world.
Heed the Verses and your soul shall be saved.
I don't hate you. Not truly, anyway. I've been praying for you all this time.
Here, have a garlic. It'll keep the vampires away and it tastes good besides.
It is the way of demons to lie and mislead. Do not listen!
The way of evil is one lie after another. Shut them out!
An open mind is like a fortress with its gates unbarred and unguarded.
Who told you our fight is futile?! I'll burn that heretic!
Be vigilant. A moment of laxity may condemn us all.
Go to sleep. Don't mind me, I'll pile the night's corpses over there.
Pray, if you know how. That's what I'll be doing.
A trophy of the hunt. Consider it a gift.
I have no use for this. Here, you take it.
This thing's last owner was a fool. Who wants it?
My faith is my shield. Do like me and you will be strong.
If you believe only what you see, you won't get out of here alive. Have faith!
Think back. Has ANYTHING the Enemy said been proven true?
You will see greater things after resurrecting. Things not made by hands or demonic tentacles.
Come, I will teach you how to pray. Let us pray for guidance, that your soul may be saved.
When your stress hits your breaking point, call upon the Holy Spirit.
Of COURSE the Enemy's purpose is to break your will! Deny them!
Your soul does not belong to the abyss, but to the Creator.
That's what you get, fool!
My faith is my shield!
Checkmate, godless filth.
We will descend upon the foe, we will overwhelm them, we will leave none alive!
The wages of sin are death!
Heresy cannot hide from me.
COWARDS DIE IN SHAME.
BURN, HERETICS!
To each of us falls a task. Let us to it!
THIS is the fate of traitors!!!
You don't frighten me. But now I got a job to do.
THIS IS THE JUDGEMENT OF THE RIGHTEOUS, SCUM!
REPENT, FOR YOUR DEATH IS AT HAND!
You will have eternity to contemplate your mistakes in the fires of Hell.
Repent while you can, worm!
I have nothing to fear from death, but YOU do!
No, this isn't possible!
Let me out of this madhouse!
What happened? My faith must not be strong enough!
The shepherd guards his sheep, 'tis true, but who guards the shepherd?!
This isn't possible! ...unless... no!
You've been with them all along, all of you!
Get behind me and I'll run you through, heretics!
Beware the tainted, for they can be depended upon to betray!
Silence! It is the way of demons to lie and mislead thus!
This is my duty, my penance!
I love the sight of blood on the floor! Hahahaha!
Is this blood mine or yours? Feh, it matters not.
Seek not rest, for only in death does duty end!
Scars are a badge of honour! Come hither and honour me!
That's enough, you've gotten in my way for the last time!
I'm fed to the teeth with your heterodoxy! Let the flames teach you now!
Why the Light bothers with your worthless souls I have no idea.
I can't wait 'til Judgement Day, that I may see you burn.
This is what happens when I fight alongside heathens! Should've known better!
Give me your share and I may consider dropping the charges against you.
You are all unworthy! It's unjust for you to be rewarded!
You contribute nothing, you get nothing.
Heretics have no right to live, let alone right to reward.
I deserve better than this! Why am I here?!
When will it all end?
Love was given to others. Now what is left for me?
Why do you not listen to the Word? Now all is lost...
Is it all worth it?
All mortal things are vanity, all physical things pass away.
I've spent my strength for you... and for what?!
CAN YOU SEE ME NOW, FATHER?!
Brother! Help me!
See how I keep changing faces?! I have problems.
Now watch as I invent a new sport with these cages and those poncy Eldar.
Are we having fun yet?!
Oh, this is going to be FUN!
BURN, HERETICS!!!
The Light won before the war even began.
The Light shines in the darkness, and the darkness COULD NOT overcome it!
God wills it!
Heed the Word and your souls will be saved!
Do you want to live forever?! COME ON THEN!!!
Extinguish the Light! TRY IT! HAH!
I will stand strong long after you're burning in HELL!
My faith is my shield! Do like me and your soul will be saved!
The kingdom of darkness will never stand!
Do as the Verses say and all will be well.
Justice can never be stopped, only delayed.
We shall not die! It is the enemy who will taste death and defeat!
I was born for this.
My craft is death!
Blasphemy! I will see you BURN, scum!
This part of the world SHALL see purity again!
Hah! Strike me, and you only fan the flames of your own coming Hell!
NONE CAN WITHSTAND OUR FAITH!
Please inquire of God, that we may know whether the journey on which we go will be prosperous.
I meditate on the Law day and night, and it gives me life.
My delight is in the Law, of which there is no shortage in the Universe.
Make me understand the way of Your precepts, and I will meditate on Your wondrous works.
Put aside your commonplace thoughts and focus on the Light.
We win now or we win on Judgement Day. What's the difference?!
Justice is impartial and wonderful.
Oh, what a joy it is to be on the right side!
I LOVE THIS!
I know You're watching, Father. I will give my all!
We've already won. Focus on your own salvation.
If you are right with God, your body's fate is immaterial.
Are you really afraid of bones, pigs, fish, heretics, and egomaniacal demons? KILL THEM!
Come, we're almost there! FORWARD!
Are you hearing that pretentious voice? Shut him out and listen to ME!
FOR LAW AND ORDER!
For the Light! What, you thought those Verses were just for show?
What ever is the matter? GET MOVING!
That one has committed many sins. I charge you to end it!
The Inquisition is with you today! End that one!
Look, that one has a big stupid face like a crosshair. You know what to do!
I want you to blow that dumb look right off that stupid face.
Strike there and knock its head clean into the next county.
The fool is distracted! NOW!
Cleanse! Purge! KILL!
Do what you were CREATED to do: destroy evil!
Cleanse! Purge! KILL!
Cleanse! Purge! KILL!
The Word is life!
For with You is the fountain of life; in Your Light do we see light.
Hear me, sire! I am in need of more life!
Heal me, Father!
Why has He forsaken us?
We must pray for forgiveness!
This isn't how it's supposed to go!
Focus, damn it, focus!!
We're drawing too many of them! Lay off!
S-STOP SCREAMING, YOU FOOL! I-I mean...
One of you is a vampire! RIGHT?!
STOP moving so quickly! You make me nervous!
Alright, which one of you heathens sold us out?!
Brother! Help me! No, not YOU...
You go first, in case it's a trap.
What are you hiding? WHAT ARE YOU HIDING?!
He who lives by the sword dies by the sword. COME ON THEN!
If my lot is to be fuel for the fire, so be it.
OUR DEATHS WILL BE MAGNIFICENT!
Surrender, fool! Break your weapon on my mighty flesh!
Go ahead and stomp my bald pate! It's what I get for not wearing a helmet!
Blood, guts, and entrails!
I should have known better than to travel with mewling infants such as you.
Pah! You want a job done right, you have to do it yourself!
I am just a hair away from killing you myself, heretics.
What, you only grew a conscience now? FIGHT, FILTH!
You tolerant fools! Can't you KILL when it matters?!
If you don't heed the Word, you're going where you deserve!
FIGHT! You need to do better than THAT if we're going to win!
And I'm supposed to cleanse the evil below with this...?
You know what the vampire and the heretic have in common...? THEY'RE BOTH BLOODSUCKERS LIKE YOU!
Storybook heroes are more competent than you fools!
What am I doing HERE? I'm better than this!
Do as I say or I'll perform inquisition upon you.
The servant is not greater than his master! Fall in!
It's no wonder the Hamlet fell apart with the likes of YOU.
Quiet! You interrupt my cunning mind!
Stop interfering with what I'm trying to do!
Why do I bother? No-one appreciates my efforts anyway.
Happiness. A luxury for those sold to evil.
The Light shines... what? I forgot! No!
A righteous man makes no friends. I just forgot, and look at me now.
Heh. I did this to myself. Life would've been easier as a heathen.
If you think it's hard to return to the Hamlet in disgrace, think what it'll be like to stand before God.
YOU DO NOT HAVE THE AUTHORITY TO EXCOMMUNICATE ME, TRAITOR!
You see Ivan, when disguise self as maskman, enemy no shoot, for too confused
AH'LL GNAW YER ARM OFF HAGRID AND BASH YEH 'CROSS THE JAW WITH IT
Enough of this foolishness! I'm going fishing!
Hacks! It must be hacks!
If I hear that abominable chanting one minute more, I'll...
LOOK AT MY HORSE, MY HORSE IS AMAZING!
Do you want to know how I got these scars?
If you stick gum on the undersides of chairs and tables, YOU ARE A SCUMBAG.
It's too much! We must flee!
SQUAD BROKEN!
Y-you go first! Go, I trust you!
Here, give me some time to form a strategem.
My fire is snuffed out! I must light it again!
Charge! No, THIS way! To the Hamlet!
Every man for himself!
You stay where I can see you and I may spare your family.
Don't make any sudden moves!
Heretic! Come out and face me like a man!
They're all around! They've got us completely surrounded!
What's the secret to long life? THAT'S RIGHT!
The Blood is heresy. Stop the bleeding, stop the heresy.
Martyr's blood is seed. See? Let me die so ten more take my place!
Let me through! I will TEAR its HEAD off!
Fastest way out is forward.
You want to fight!? COME HERE!
I'M GONNA DECK YA!
I will now warp travel on a bicycle. Look at me go!
How dare you go to the party without me!
Why do you treat me so brutally, friend? What did I ever do to you?
Who needs brain?! I will SMASH them with the sheer MIGHT OF MY CRANIUM!
No, YOU go to Heaven! ...wait...
Why do we put one foot in front of the other? Why not slide like this?
CULINARY INSPIRATION!
You accuse ME of murder! I will not stand for this!
Excuse me, I have to go polish my humans.
Oh, no! I left the corpses on the fire!
Forget sailing! Come fly with me!
Ooh! What is that over there?!
Stop barking! Where is that hideous noise coming from?!
A bush in the bird is worth two in the hand.
What more do you want of me? Please, just end my suffering...
End me now, and I go to a better place. Will you?
My face hasn't exactly made me popular. Suppose you help me with that.
End my suffering. My sacrifices matter to no-one anyway.
Let us see if He appreciates me at least.
Please, just leave me alone...
Dark brown is the hazelnut...
Clearly I wasn't good enough. Figures.
Why am I worth so little? WHY?!
Go ahead. No-one will miss me.
Out of the way, peasant. This is knight's work.
What are you trying to do? Steal my glory?! Get out.
I'm getting in this time and nothing stops me.
That one belongs to me.
Let me at them! I can do it better anyhow.
I have a problem. YOU'RE OBSTRUCTING ME!
Nuh-uh. Safety first. MY safety first of all.
Buy me some time so I may save your hide.
Gah, you smell like a grimoire!
Sit right there, sentient meatbag. Give me a moment.
Give me some room!
Do what you do best and shield your betters!
A-alright, I'll just... NO! HELP!
T-the spirit is willing, but the flesh is weak!
WHERE'S OUR FIRE SUPPORT?!
Are you sure?
I-I really would rather not.
I'm not strong enough!
Oh, were you talking?
Absolutely not. You're TRYING to get me killed!
I see the faithlessness in your eyes, heathen! You're one of THEM!
NO! I can't trust ANYONE!
And be betrayed again? Never!
Put it in writing and I'll consider it.
You're a heretic! You traitor!
Just how are you issuing commands to us, anyway?
DEMON! Oh, that was you? Sorry, hehe...
I'd rather wait for the cavalry!
Maybe He does, maybe He does not. But I certainly do not will it!
I have a better idea. How about no?
Oh, certainly, certainly! And do you want my head mounted on your wall too?
Maybe later. I'm trying to survive here.
Not the best strategem right now, believe me!
Are you cursing at me?!
Why should I? You don't care about me any more than THEY do.
Please, just get me out of here...
Nothing matters anymore.
Maybe we were the Flame once, but our fuel is running out.
So many mistakes... one more or less won't make any difference, you know?
This is as good a time as any to rethink my life.
Don't I get a last request?
Please, I'm not so young anymore...
Not now, I'm busy!
But if I fail at life... do I succeed at death?
Get me a better weapon first! This one is made of fail.
Hm... needs more salt!
Wait, let me see where it says that...
THERE you are! Did you sleep well?
That old man that keeps talking to you needs to be beaten within an inch of his life!
Can't trust ANY of you fools, can I?!
You got me into this, I'm getting myself out.
Stop that! I've gotten an idea!
Rolling the dice isn't always bad. The first crusaders divided their spoils that way.
How can I know which of you has betrayed us?!
Heads or tails. Sure more trustworthy than a heretic.
If you're not in this room, how can I be sure it's really you?
You want to fight?! Well, let's go!
Come on, put 'em up, you cowards!
I will CRUCIFY you on my staff!
This should inflict suitable pain!
Hah! Let's try it again!
Kill, stab, uh... something.
WAAAGH!!!
IT'S A FIGHT NOW!
Incompetent. I'd do better myself.
No better than those blind, corrupt fools in the church.
Take the log out of your own eye and then we can talk about my speck.
Relinquish your heretical beliefs and then we'll talk.
This is YOUR fault! You brought me to this!
I'll take matters into my own hands! Worked before!
Sit down, kid, I have things under control!
Stop squirming and die like an adult!
Stop bothering me! I have work to do!
Let me see now. Where was I before I was so rudely interrupted?
Leave it with my secretary. I'll look at it later if I have time.
Looks like an example will have to be made.
Let a professional do the work now.
Do you see this? Don't use that tone with me!
And they call me evil and insane, just for trying to do good...
Leave me alone. I'm at the end of my rope.
All will die for refusing to heed the Word. I don't want to see it.
Please stay with me! I'll protect you.
Such is my lot. Let me embrace it already.
Feh. Things are little better out there.
In the grim darkness of the far future... there is only war.
How did I get here?
Stop it! I've nearly discovered time travel!
Ooh! Shiny! I will TAKE IT OFF YOUR FACE!
Where are you going, weapon of mine? Get back here!
How did I get here?
When I was young, I lived... somewhere. AND LOOK AT ME NOW!
Cut off one head and two more take its place.
No! Please! Don't go anywhere!
Can I go home now?
DON'T MOVE! What was that sound?
I heard that! That was a pagan prayer, wasn't it!
I see you looking at my jugular vein! One move and you get the stake!
Keep your distance and we'll be fine.
You're starting to look fishy! Pray you don't look any MORE fishy or else!
You see, the secret to avoiding heresy is not taking blood, but giving it.
Take my blood. All of it. Didn't need it anyway.
A refreshing vacation, to be sure.
Who's hiding back there? Come so I can split your head open!
Your existence is offensive to the Almighty!
If you're looking for trouble, I can accommodate you.
Go ahead. Act on your thoughts of me. I'll return the favour in kind.
That bad feeling is going to be replaced by blinding pain if you don't shut up!
I HATE YOU ALL!
You're no better than those traitors who tried to excommunicate me.
I'M not the madman, you degenerate filth.
I expect full compensation for putting up with this.
You need to be more dignified! You need to be more like... me!
What sinfulness are you hiding there? Give it to me NOW!
I thought being good was supposed to make you loved. Guess not.
Go ahead. Take my portion. I don't matter, after all.
Suffering noble and all... until you begin.
So much misery among us... are we bringing happiness to anybody?
Half-hearted efforts and selfishness are why Mankind is failing now.
But my liege, I object to this plan that you have planned.
Now, which one of you stole my hair?!
You want to hear a joke? Darkness! HAHA!!
Fire makes food taste good? Well, fire must taste even better! Give me some of it!
Considering the practise I'm getting with this hammer, I ought to try croquet.
How about a song from the future, everybody?!
If they'd bothered to make this mod-friendly, I wouldn't look like this!
I leave myself open to attack. Do it, I dare you!
Harm me and you incur the wrath of the Almighty. Go ahead!
I don't wear this pauldron just for show! Come on, give it here!
Target me! I can take it!
I can't bear it any longer. Come get me. Here.
The sooner I go, the sooner I reunite with them all.
I miss my dear old golden-maned dog...
There are other heroes coming. You won't miss one.
Hey! Have you seen my new shoes?! They are made out of STEEL!
Look at me!! My pate is bald! Shiny, too!
I'M FABULOUS!
Hey, watch me trigger the Enemy. YOU ARE FAKE NEWS!
Hey, stupid! You got a face that could only come out of the Warrens!
YOU are the vampiric infiltrator! Take this!!
AHA! Found you, heretic!
A SKELETON! HAVE AT THEE!
On my side? Lier! INCORRECT GRAMMAR?!
You WILL heed the Word, or I'll BEAT it into you!
THIS is for your black thoughts on privateerism!
THIS is how to strike, you fool!
You've done it now.
I'm going to beat you bloody, ungrateful wretch!
You piece of trash!
Ooh! A piÃ±ata! Let me at it!
Found you, xeno! Come out of that costume!
Stop squirming and let me FIX your FACE!
Repeat after me: "I can't believe you done this."
Hah! I'm not afraid of blood! Watch this!
Feh! Don't need THIS, or THAT...
Yes! I can serve the Light without ANY limbs! Just watch!
I can do this with both hands tied behind my back! Watch!
Heaven forgive me...
If you're not in my life, I should be OUT of my life...
I've done enough. You take it from here.
I've spent all my tricks. I'm sorry.
I'm done. Farewell. You take care now.
How did I get so big? Something's not right here, let me fix it!
Why do I keep changing into this little helmeted man? Out, impostor!
Why is there a heretical version of me fighting us out there? Or maybe I'M the... NO!
Probably a good idea, but YOU probably have a trap set up on the other side!
Alright, just give me a little more time to calculate...
Are you in league with the old man that started this all? FORWARD!
That's just what they want us to do!
Forsake my body, sure. Forsake my soul, NEVER!
No. Let me die honourably at least.
To add that dishonour on top of everything else? We make our stand here.
ARE YOU READY TO DIE FOR ME?
No. Let the bloodletting continue.
Cowards die in shame! They die twice, thrice even!
What's the rush? We can't keep them waiting!
No! Not now, I'm going to win this hand!
If you run from the cops, you alone are at fault if they shoot at you.
I haven't time to play now. I'm doing taxes.
ARGH! AAYYIKKE!
OOAH!
They came from behind!
Did I mention the one about two heads yet? Yep.
Heretics and apostates and profligates, oh my!
Why, you worthless pretender!
If I die, who will perform last rites?
Feh.
Is that so?
Can't you just sit still for a minute, damn it!
Hm, like big fat grapes...
Pathetic!
Ah, look! THE SINGULARITY ENGINE!
Faster, Iago! Faster!
Never pay more than 20 for entertainment.
This isn't how the plan goes! Try again!
Need backup! Something!
WATCH OUT HE'S GOING TO STRIKE YOU SO HARD THE EARTH WILL FEEL IT!
Treachery and evil abound!
WHAT ARE YOU HIDING FROM ME?!
One of you poisoned me! I know it!
Unpolished. Unworthy.
What is wrong with you?!
I'm not seeing enough blood here!
Why is it a bulls-eye if a squirrel's eye is smaller?
Be of good cheer, lad. It's hard to aim in low gravity.
You can't aim with tears in your eyes! Stop snivelling!
Stop your nonsense or I will stop YOU.
Heresy! You must cease and desist immediately!
Stop tickling him with your weapon! That's not how you use it!
I wouldn't be a bit surprised if you did that with unholy assistance.
Let a professional do it, you moron.
I could have hit him so hard they'd feel it in the next dungeon over.
Crunchy moon-dust! Yes, that's what you need!
Did you forget to say your prayers again?
Make sure he's dead, or he'll be back for the sequel!
Just as I thought. Quick, with me!
Is it really that fast? Come on, let's go!
What are you waiting for? HIT HIM!
Are you trying to kill us or them?!
Oh, you'll pay for your lack of vision!
You better strike gain before I decide you're a traitor after all!
It's a wonder we got even this far with such a display.
And this is why I worked alone up until now.
You fool!
This is why you go to church and not the bar, you drunken profligate!
This is what you get for resenting my prayers for you.
Learned your lesson yet?
At least I'm not an idiot too.
Fish!
I know where you can get some fine spectacles.
You realise, of course, the numbers are stacked against us. I looked in the files and saw.
Did you know your minimum chance to hit is zero but your maximum is ninety-five? And THEY call that FAIR!
You're looking more like me now! What a development!
Don't worry, it'll come off of you... right?
No! Have mercy on that poor young one!
I'm confused...
Light preserve us!
Someone told them our tactics! Surely!
You sit tight and live through it.
I'm over HERE, you fools!
Bite the bullet, weakling!
Children should not play men's games!
Ready to let a devout individual do his work the proper way now?
About time!
Stop being so loud! I'm trying to write here!
Hm, I think you just invented a new note there!
The base chance of virtue is twenty-five percent. Now you know how balanced this is.
Stacked numbers and artificially extended campaigns are not how you design a challenge.
What have you done!
This can't be happening!
Will we make it out alive?
You've been conspiring with them all along! I see it now!
Impostor! Decide now whom you serve!
You're a traitor. Right? RIGHT?!
It won't come off? Here, let the inventor show you how.
ZOGGIN' KRUMP 'IM, YA GIT!
Edit the files. There's no shame in rectifying a poorly designed challenge.
Blood is thicker than water. My blood most of all.
S-stand your ground, damn it!
I-I'm not a coward! I'M NOT, ALRIGHT?!
Oho! Fancy yourself an escape artist, eh? SIDDOWN.
Your heresy will not escape its retribution this time.
Plant yourself like a tree and don't make any sudden moves.
First I'm going to beat the stuffing out of you.
Is your stuffing beat yet?
Why? This is such good entertainment!
I always knew you were spineless vermin.
Sit down or I'll knock you down.
Bow and cross yourself when you pass me, heathen!
Yellowbelly! You stay right where you are!
Where are you going? You haven't seen my performance!
You know, you're not so bad. Stick around, won't you?
DLC? What's that? Whatever it is, it's not something you yourself want to buy.
It's not consecrated. How do I know you didn't curse it?
I trust you as I would a snake. I think not.
STOP IT! I don't trust you!
Suffering and I are one. What God has joined, let no man separate.
Stop distracting me, so I can regain my wits and stop speaking nonsense!
Blood makes a good paintjob, alright?
Don't waste your strength on me. No-one would even notice.
It's the same one way or another. (sigh)
Let me ask you something. Do you REALLY care?
Give it to me. I will use it to FIX your FACE!
Ooh! CRUNCHY!
Ever wonder why we number the years the way we do? Mm-hm! Why is that relevant? Reasons!
The dose distinguishes poison from medicine. Which is why I don't trust you.
Cease your witchcraft! I will not tolerate it!
Get away from me with that!
Do you heal by the power of God or your heathen sorceries?!
If my craft is death, should I not partake of it too?
And evade my just due? No, I deserve this for my failure.
I have failed you for the last time. Let me pay the price.
No, you'll ruin my glorious scars!
No... you couldn't be sincere...
Do not prolong my suffering!
I failed. Leave me be.
You don't really care about me. No-one does, after all.
YOU DARE TO GIVE ME LEMONS?!
I am not an abomination! Stop trying to brand me!
Ugh, I can't stand the taste of that.
I'll have two number nines, a number nine large, a number six with extra dip...
Pagan rituals. Amusing.
Stay where you are!
I will not imbibe unholy assistance.
That's kind of you. BUT do you have unholy assistance?
Foolishness.
Go away, you bother me!
Sure, add another scar why don't you.
How will I get better if you make it easier?
I've done better than that. Look where I've brought us.
Please, just leave me alone.
You're just using me, aren't you?
Just play me a dirge and let's be done with it.
Pay me first.
Get with the program.
Stop talking! They'll hear you!
No! I'm tired of that fool blabbering about brilliant confluences of skill and purpose!
Take your filthy paws off of me, you heathen!
You'll pay for your insolence, worm!
Yes, yes, I've seen it all before. STOP IT!
The negative emotions aren't so bad.
I hope my new book opens the eyes of many.
In this chapter, I'll make a mockery of the godless.
I can't die yet. So many things to learn.
M-my wits fail me!
Hold your horses, let me regain my strength.
I can't! I must stay alert for the ambush!
Traitor! How can I strengthen that which I set out to destroy?
Help a traitor! I could not!
Helping a heretic would betray all that I stand for.
If the Light has put this crucible in our way, why should I stop it?
No. You have failed, and you will pay the price.
I have failed. I am going to pay the price.
Why should I help you if you hate me, wretch?
Oh, I'll help you, alright. Help you go where you belong.
You are unworthy filth. You betray the Light!
Ever wonder why I keep all this garlic for myself? That's why.
All I've got for you is a prayer and a bar of soap.
Recant your insults and then we'll talk.
The spirit is willing but the flesh is weak.
It's not my fault, if in God's plan, He made the devil so much stronger than a man!
I can't. I can't do anything.
Not now, I'm busy polishing my head.
Pfft, who dresses you? The garbageman?
Give me more. I'm hungry!
Mistaken in death as you were in life, old partner!
Pious men have died by poisoning and stabbing before. Not me!
Keep away from me, or this stick goes up your nose.
Nice try. I will not be assassinated.
I have nothing left to lose. Go away.
Leave me alone, I'll do it myself.
Breaking a fasting prayer is a sin.
After what you did, do you think I'll let you near me? As if!
Your incompetence will only bring me bodily harm.
Perverse in mind, perverse in body too no doubt.
Do not interrupt me. I'm praying for your soul.
My injury is not in body, but in mind.
Whatever.
Thank-you, but I'm going to go cook my hats.
Ever tried dissolving sun-stone in tea? Tastes like stardust!
Wait, you mean everything ISN'T supposed to be all blurry?!
Did you poison it? DID YOU POISON IT?!
You'd love to let that knife slip in my direction, wouldn't you?
I can't eat this! ABSOLUTELY anathema!
Fasting and prayer is all I need.
No, I'm fasting.
I don't feel like eating, thank-you.
Ugh, no... I have no appetite.
I would like to eat your map.
Remember how the prophet ate the book? Time for me to do the same.
